data.Name: Stelios Gragoudas
data.staff_bio: Stelios has over 20 years experience in the special education field. His research centers on the transition of youth with disabilities from high school to adult life. In addition Stelios provides professional development to educators across Massachusetts on topics such as transition, self-determination, career development and post-secondary education for youth with intellectual disabilities.
data.staff_ed:
BS, Special Education, Boston University
MS, Rehabilitation Counseling, Boston University
Ed.D, Special Education, University of Kansas
